rows.label: tlk4235012502_msg0001
rows.name:
Mokumoku have question. Friends
ever see crazy-strong monsters on
travels?

rows.label: tlk4235012502_msg0002
rows.name:
Strong monsters get famous and
receive special names. Mokumoku not
sure exactly who name them, though.

rows.label: tlk4235012502_msg0003
rows.name:
If friends want to challenge monsters,
Mokumoku not stop you, but best idea
is to run away.
